    Class and Description
    org.apache.solr.search.Insanity
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy.clone()
    will be removed in Solr 7
    org.apache.solr.search.grouping.GroupingSpecification.getGroupLimit()
    org.apache.solr.search.grouping.GroupingSpecification.getGroupOffset()
    org.apache.solr.search.grouping.GroupingSpecification.getGroupSort()
    org.apache.solr.handler.component.HighlightComponent.getHighlighter()
    org.apache.solr.handler.component.HighlightComponent.getHighlighter(SolrCore)
    instead depend on HighlightComponent.process(ResponseBuilder) to choose the highlighter based on HighlightParams.METHOD
    org.apache.solr.search.grouping.GroupingSpecification.getLimit()
    org.apache.solr.search.grouping.GroupingSpecification.getOffset()
    org.apache.solr.search.QParser.getSort(boolean)
    Use the not misleadingly named getSortSpec() function instead.
    org.apache.solr.search.grouping.GroupingSpecification.getSortWithinGroup()
    org.apache.solr.search.grouping.GroupingSpecification.getWithinGroupLimit()
    org.apache.solr.search.grouping.GroupingSpecification.getWithinGroupOffset()
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy.setCommentStart(char)
    will be removed in Solr 7
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy.setDelimiter(char)
    will be removed in Solr 7
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy.setEncapsulator(char)
    will be removed in Solr 7
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy.setEscape(char)
    will be removed in Solr 7
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy.setIgnoreEmptyLines(boolean)
    will be removed in Solr 7
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy.setIgnoreLeadingWhitespaces(boolean)
    will be removed in Solr 7
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy.setIgnoreTrailingWhitespaces(boolean)
    will be removed in Solr 7
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy.setPrinterNewline(String)
    will be removed in Solr 7
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy.setUnicodeEscapeInterpretation(boolean)
    will be removed in Solr 7
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.apache.solr.internal.csv.CSVStrategy(char, char, char, char, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    Use the ctor that also takes printerNewline. This ctor will be removed in Solr 7.
    org.apache.solr.handler.SnapShooter(SolrCore, String, String)
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    org.apache.solr.uninverting.UninvertingReader.Type.LEGACY_DOUBLE
    Index with points and use UninvertingReader.Type.DOUBLE_POINT instead.
    org.apache.solr.uninverting.UninvertingReader.Type.LEGACY_FLOAT
    Index with points and use UninvertingReader.Type.FLOAT_POINT instead.
    org.apache.solr.uninverting.UninvertingReader.Type.LEGACY_INTEGER
    Index with points and use UninvertingReader.Type.INTEGER_POINT instead.
    org.apache.solr.uninverting.UninvertingReader.Type.LEGACY_LONG
    Index with points and use UninvertingReader.Type.LONG_POINT instead.
